title: STBI Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for Assistant Manager Posts
description: Savli Technology and Business Incubator (STBI) has released an official notification for 2026. To fill up vacancies for Assistant Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the STBI Recruitment 2026 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts...
